content.p: If you need advice using the universityâ€™s digital services and technologies in your research, please contact a Digital Research Specialist. Find contacts and more information on our Digital Research SharePoint site: Introduction to Digital Research We help researchers build bespoke software, analyse data, and publish datasets. We are a team of experts in data analytics, research software engineering, statistics, machine-learning and high-performance computing. Please get in touch to discuss staffing costs and how we might best support your research. Find out more here: Digital Research Service Reseach tools and resources Services to support your research
